pages.text: People ask you about the hour of doom, say, “The knowledge about it is only with God, and what will make you understand, perhaps the hour of doom is near.”
God has certainly cursed the disbelievers and has prepared a blazing fire for them
in which they will remain for ever. They will find neither a guardian nor a helper
The day their faces will be turned in the fire, they will say, “O would that we had obeyed God and obeyed the messenger.”
And they will say, “Our Lord! We certainly obeyed our leaders and our great men so they misled us from the way
Our Lord! give them double the punishment and curse them with a great curse.”
O you who believe! do not be like those who annoyed Moses, so God made him free from that which they said, and he was honorable in the sight of God
O you who believe! fear God and make statements to the point
He will set right for you your deeds and protectively forgive you your sins, and he who obeys God and His messenger, he indeed has achieved a great achievement

We certainly offered the trust (probably the power of decision to obey or not to obey the orders of God) to the skies and the earth and the mountains, but they refused to bear it and became afraid of it, and man (undertook the responsibility of) bearing it (but) he was certainly unjust, ignorant

so God will punish the hypocrite men and the hypocrite women and the polytheist men and the polytheist women, and God will turn (mercifully) to the believing men and the believing women and God is Protectively Forgiving, Merciful
